description: We are looking for a customer service representative to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for interacting with customers to provide information in response to inquiries about products and services. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
responsibilities: Interact with customers to provide information in response to inquiries about products and services, handle and resolve customer complaints, process orders and returns, maintain customer accounts
experience: At least 1 year of experience in customer service
